DOC.brief_summary: A multicentre , open , randomized phase II study compare multimodal intervention ( oral nutritional supplement , celecoxib physical exercise ) cachexia versus standard cancer care .
DOC.brief_title: A Feasibility Study Multimodal Exercise/Nutrition/Anti-inflammatory Treatment Cachexia - Pre-MENAC Study
DOC.criteria: Main eligibility criterion : Advanced nonsmallcell lung cancer ( stage IIIIV ) pancreatic cancer eligible curative therapy Due commence chemo chemo radiotherapy Karnofsky Performance Score ≥ 70 A life expectancy ≥4 month consider able complete 2 month study
